sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = ({ activeTab, countdown, refreshCount, totalCandidates, onTabChange }) => { return (

⚙️ Configuration

🎥 Projector Mode

✅ Enabled

🔗 Google Sheets Connection

✅ Connected to Google Sheets

📊 Total Candidates: {totalCandidates}

🔄 Tab Switching Status

Current tab: {activeTab === 0 ? '🏆 Top 10' : '📊 Remaining'}

⏱️ Next switch in: {countdown} seconds

📊 Refresh Status

🔄 Refresh count: {refreshCount}

⏰ Auto-refresh: Every 1 minute

🔍 Debug Info

Active tab: {activeTab}

Countdown: {countdown}s

); }; export default Sidebar;
